115122.content:
After hours of nothing but empty desert, Ashelin set down her cruiser away from it's usual spot, near a line of restaurants and stores. This wasn't too unusual, Ashelin on occasion grabbing a bite to eat after a long time away, but she usually didn't order so much ... or in their biggest sizes. This time red headed woman sat with a trio of bags overflowing with burgers, fries and other quick treats.

Ashelin had all three empty within a few minutes, even with getting up to refill her drink a half dozen times. By the end, Ashelin was lucky she didn't wear anything over her belly, a serious food baby pushing out as far as her breasts. A gloved hand rubbed the mound as she walked, the low lying belt pushed slightly downward as she moved, ready to order from the next restaurant. Ashelin blinked, she hadn't realized that she was walking to more fast food, and not her car, but a groan from her rounded stomach and she found herself ordering another round of new, tasty food.

A stack of tacos, burritos, quesadillas sat before the woman, surrounded by drinks, and only a twinge at the back of her head told her this wasn't normal. A growl from her round belly demanded more though, and Ashelin couldn't disagree. A few extra pounds only would end up in good places anyway. If anyone was watching, a good chance for the firey haired bombshell, they would have thought she was starving, the way tacos dissappearing, and burritos were shoved past her hungry lips. The usually tone stomach expanded, pushing past her breasts, getting rounder and rounder as it looked like she had swallowed a basket ball.

There was a thump as her hand slapped the food packed gut, leaning against the wall, panting as Ashelin held her new found gut sticking out twice as far as her chest now, firm and pregnant t looking. Her well sized breasts could now rest upon the round belly, jiggling as she walked, or her hands bumped them. The belt groaned, strained by her belly and hips nearly to the breaking point, pushed low enough to reveal her thong. The mass of food slowly bounced and swayed as Ashelin walked, the pleasure of a full gut driving her to eat more. The only question was should she move on to buffets, or see if she could score some grub and drinks at the Naughty Ottsel.

Ratchet, who's life had once been full of thrill and adventure, now finds himself longing for the buzz that once filled his life. He lay in bed staring at the celing of his room. It had been quiet a long time since he had contact with anyone, well besides clank that is. He sighed and slowly got out of bead, heading downstairs where clank was sure to be. Now it had been about six months since the dynamic duo had returned from their last quest to save the galaxy and have sieced to participate in any galaxy saving activities since, infact, most forms of physical ecurtion was elimated from their lifestyles. Needless to say his figure looked a bit thicker than it had six months ago, he was a long way from fat and still a bit of weight from even chubby, his shape was just a bit softer. Ratchet didn't really mind the weight seeing as it was so minimal that a week of intense workouts would put him back in his old 'hero' shape. "Mornin' Clank! What's on the agenda today?"
"Good Morning to you to Ratchet." clank responded in his usual monotone voice, "Well a new resturant just opened up not far from here, also i hear rumors that a gadgetron ship shop is opening right next door.!"
"Awesome lets head out! Mind if we grab a bite at that new resturant? What kind is it anyway?"
"Well, I hear that it is...

12421.content:
A frustrated growl came from the space witch as she folds her arms and rested against the wall in her specialized cell. Being in prison was the worst! Vendra just could not stand it at all. Neftin seemed comfortable with it however. Unfortunately, that only drove the witch more crazy. To make matters worse, they weren't even put in the same cell together! Just when their relationship was taking a turn for the better, they were forced apart and barely saw one another.

Vendra had a lot of time to think over her life now. From the days of living in the orphanage, discovering Mr. Eye, working her way to reuniting with her kind, battling with Ratchet, and then finally....the betrayal. The witch brought her knees closer to her as she tried to stop thinking about it. It filled her with so much rage! How dare that...that monster. She had been a simple tool to him...

"...Why did this all have to happen to me?" Vendra sighed and spoke to herself. What in the world was there for her to do now? Just live out the rest of her life in this horrible prison?

No.

Vendra wouldn't allow that to happen! She had been through so much! She had felt nothing but pain. Now it was time to share it with others.

That's when an evil little idea came to the witch. It was disturbing and vile. No doubt it would make others cringe in fear. It was perfect. And she knew exactly who to start with.

Ratchet and his little friends.

He looked around and yelled, "Bentley, what did you do?!" "It's my newest formula, Sly. It allows you to shrink so you can perform robberies more efficiently." explained Bentley to the still-shrinking raccoon. By the time it shrinking stopped, Sly was 7 inches tall and yelled not in anger, but just loud enough for Bentley to hear, "How can being this height help?" Making a quick retreat into one of the vents, Sly used his speed to move as fast as he could up the vent. But his time was running out. Thanks to the chemicals that splattered on his fur, Sly was beginning to grow. He felt his stomach stretching bigger as soon as he made his way to the end. Punching the gate off, Sly tried to escape, but he got stuck. "Oh no." he said. For Sly, being stuck was a first time for him.

But that was the least of his problems. Even now, he was growing bigger. His slim frame was growing into a pile of furry fat that was pushing against the vent's walls. "Bentley! Murray! Help!" he called.

"Where are you, Sly?" Bentley asked. "I'm stuck inside one of the vents! Get Murray to pull me out!" Sly said. "We're on our way!" Bentley said. Rushing to their friend's help, Murray dove the van as close to the vent as he could. "Hurry! Before I get any worse!" he called. "Murray, use this rope to pull Sly out!" Bentley said. "Gotcha!" he said.

The hippo threw the rope up and Sly grabbed it with his teeth. "Pull, Murray!" Bentley said. "I'm trying! He's getting heavier!" Murray yelled.

Then all of a sudden...

Sly fell down and with a force so strong, it pulled the rope right out of Murray's hands. For a moment, Sly was nowhere to be found. "What happened?" Murray asked. "The vent must have collapsed under his new weight." Bentley. "Will he be all right?"

Suddenly, a loud booming came from the wall. Soon, it got louder and louder. Then a massive fist smashed through the wall. "Whoa!" they exclaimed. Soon the hand began to rip through the wall like paper. Tearing it down in a straight line, the hand made way for a massive boom that broke the wall completely open. Under its destroyed pile of metal pieces was a jiggling gray blob that was bigger than their van.

"Sly?" asked Murray. Walking out of the building, Sly moved toward his friends. He was now 16 feet tall and had a stomach that was 10 feet wide.

Shrugging, Sly silently grabbed his sack and headed out his bedroom window for something to eat. They had arrived in pure darkness - Sly estimated he had about two hours until sunrise - and as such all the stores were closed. However, Sly knew of a nearby grocery store with a very lax security system. He'd pop in, grab a bite to eat and head back home to sleep, he thought to himself, smiling as he crossed rooftops to reach the store.

All it took was a tap on a loose window and Sly was inside, having landed in the bakery section. He opened his bag and got to work, looking around for appealing deserts. After a few minutes to decide, he had selected half a dozen eclairs, two cakes and four small fruit pies. The raccoon thought that seemed like a lot, but this store's bakery was award-winning, and besides, he could leave the leftovers for his friends later. Coming out the way he came, Sly hurried back home.

Once safely back in the hideout, Sly's hunger had won him over, and he found himself famished, immediately tearing into the first eclair as he sat down on his bed. It tasted divine, the cream and chocolate perfectly moistening the flaky pastry. As soon as he finished the first, he continued onto the second, then the third. Before long he had finished all six, and still felt hungry. "That's strange," he thought, "I should be full by now," but when he looked down at his stomach, it didn't appear full. Actually, it was almost empty and gurgling, asking for more food. So Sly obliged it. The pies came next - small, but good. Apple, cherry, peach, and the best of all, lemon meringue. Without even questioning it, Sly took a huge bite into the first of the two cakes, slowly but surely whittling the foot-wide confectionaries down to nothing.

Finally feeling full from his feast - his stomach feeling slightly round - Sly found himself suddenly tired, and climbed into a laying position on his bed, not even pausing to take off his clothes. He rubbed his aching belly as he drifted off into a very comfortable sleep.

To Sly’s surprise, Carmelita stood in the doorway, bigger than he was. She wore a pair of food-stained sweatpants that just barely fit on her flabby, blubbersome legs, so thick that her thighs rubbed together, fat piling around her chubby feet. Her arms were thick slabs, her pudgy, triple-chinned face bearing a hesitant grin.

Sly blinked. “Oh geez… You too?” he said.

She nodded. “Yeah… Glad to see it’s not just me that slobbed out after catching this,” she said. “Can I come in? It’s really hard to stand up now.”

Sly nodded. “Yeah, yeah sure…” he said. He quickly looked around for a place for her to sit, and spotted another sofa set by the one he had been stuffing his face on, gesturing to him. Carmelita thanked him and waddled in, Sly watching her huge, jiggling ass with a grin on his face.

Sly sat down and tossed her a bag of burgers, which she greedily started eating. He explained what happened, and what he was doing since then.

“Believe it or not, I’ve actually started to like the way I smell,” he said, grinning embarrassedly.

Carmelita blushed. “Me too, actually… I was actually one of the first people infected, which is why I’m bigger than you.”

“I was wondering where you had gotten off to,” Sly said.

Carmelita nodded. “I’ve actually been under the care of the people who developed the virus. They’ve been tracking down all of the infected to try and work on a cure. They’ve been keeping me fed, keeping me in books and in computers designed to resist having food slopped all over them. And they’re the ones who brought me to you.”

Sly blinked. “How did you find me?”

Carmelita just smirked. “Unlike you, mister master thief, I don’t need a super-trim body to do detective work. I just tracked down all signs of someone who’d been affected and narrowed down places where you might be.”

Sly stared at her a moment and chuckled, shaking his head, knowing she was right. Thieving would be next to impossible in this state unless he went for a styleless thug robbery, one that had too much risk for innocents getting hurt. “All right, that’s the how. What about the why?”

Carmelita blushed brightly, nervously gulping down a burger whole. “…I was lonely, okay? The more I thought about you, the more I wanted to be with you. Once I tracked you down, they were willing to take me to you, and agreed to keep us both fed in exchange for occasional blood samples to try and work on a cure.”

Sly blinked, blushing and smiling. “I’m… I’m flattered really… And the company… They’re willing to help us maintain our slobby lifestyle? Seriously?”

Carmelita blushed, nodding. “Yeah… Honestly, I can’t think of anything better right now. I love eating and just laying around, and… I can’t help but remember how wonderful our brief time as an actual couple was… I want that again, Sly. We’d have to figure out how to have sex at this size, but I’m more than willing to try…”

Sly hesitated. It was an incredible offer. He still desired Carmelita, having had a happy time with her as a couple, and the fact that she was actually a bigger slob than he was right now kind of excited him. Plus, with this, he’d have guaranteed food and sex without having to sweat off precious calories searching for it…

But he still was wanting to be a thief. He still missed the action. Could he have it both ways?

When they got to the station, Sly was taken to an interrogation room and sat down in a chair that was too small for his huge butt. Need me to rat on some thieves, confess to a crime you can't pin on me, or is this your idea of a date?"

"No, no, and not in your *urrp* dreams." She said, covering her mouth in embarrassment.

"Wow, you sure are full of *pfft* surprises."

She waved a hand in front of her face in disgust as she tried to hide the fact that fart smelled pretty good. "Listen Cooper, I want you to listen to everything I have to say and no jokes or flirting. Got it?"

He nodded as he grabbed some more of the food she brought in. Carmelita sighed and grabbed a bag of chips to calm her nerves. "I can't believe I'm saying this but....my superiors need your services."

Sly nearly did a spit take and judged Carmelita to see if she was joking. "You mean Interpol needs my help?"

"*Sigh* Yes. This plague is getting worse and more people are getting infected. We believe that the terrorists that created the virus may have the antidote or at the very least know how to make one. Unfortunately no one in Interpol has the skills you have, or had, to break into their compound and take it, let alone find it. So basically if you and your team can find the compound and steal the cure and give it to us, we're willing to shorten your prison sentence." She explained.

"And you're really going to trust me to give the cure back?"

"You may be a despicable thief but I do know that you're not a monster. You wouldn't let millions suffer. Besides, I'll be working with you to make sure you don't try anything."

That managed to get Sly's attention. "And how much time would I have to serve after this is done."

"40-50 years, with good behavior."

Not the best offer but Sly was interested. It would give him a chance to do some thievery and spend time with Carmelita. Although he could decline and wait for her to give a better offer and enjoy prison life until then. Sitting in a cell and getting free food sounded kinda nice. What does he do in the end?

While it was probably a very bad idea, Sly was willing to listen to Penelope explain herself not only because he was growing more attracted to her by the second but also because she was part of his gang and a friend. He had to give her a benefit of a doubt. He put his gloved hand on Carmelita's gun and lowered it. "Let's hear her out. Besides, she's the only hope we have of finding Bentley." Sly reasoned with Carmelita. The fox didn't take her eyes off Penelope and glared at her. She growled and said, "Fine, but I will shoot if you try to eat us."

Penelope solemnly nodded and said, "I understand."

"So what do you mean this isn't your fault?" Sly asked her again. "Well after I contracted the virus I've been monitoring my symptoms and have been trying to study it. When my hunger prevented me from focusing on my work I built these little guys to feed me and answer deliveries. It wasn't until a week ago that a burglar broke in and tried to rob me and sell my creations. I panicked and everything just became a blur and the next thing I knew he was gone and my gut was bigger and squirming. At first I didn't know how I did this until I had to sign for a delivery. I was so hungry and the next thing I knew everything became a blur again and I was fatter. I tried to avoid any contact with people but some people followed my robots to me and I couldn't resist. I'm couldn't control myself but I've managed to gain some control but sometimes it gets unbearable. The only explanation I can think of is that the virus is evolving and changing us. I've talked with Bentley and he agrees with me that-"

"Hold it, you've been in contact with Bentley?" Sly interrupted. "All the time. Follow me, I think it's best that you hear Bentley explain it himself." Penelope told them. Sly and Carmelita shared a confused look but followed her. Penelope turned around and lead her guests to where her laptop is, passing by her workshops where she built her robotic assistants. "After I started showing symptoms of the infection Bentley packed his stuff and relocated to a new location without telling me or Murray. He hasn't abandoned me completely though. Occasionally he'll send me e-mails or we video chat about the progress we made. We've each been researching it differently. I think his last video should vouch for me."

Penelope tried to bend over and grab her laptop but couldn't quite reach it. Sly did get a good look at the massive crevice that was Penelope's butt crack that did arouse him. "Um, could you hand me the remote in my 3rd right pocket Carmelita?" Penelope asked. The fox obliged and handed her the remote. Penelope used it to control a tiny robot to find the video file and play it. Carmelita and Sly watched to see a video of Bentley appear on screen.

"Greetings Penelope, sorry it's been a while since I responded but I've been rather busy lately. I had to strengthen my securities around my lab because....well... I think you may have a reason to be worried about those gaps in your memory. I've studied the sample and reports you sent me and I think you may be onto something. It looks like this virus seems to be evolving the longer it's in a host. Every time it evolves, it unleashes new symptoms in the host that take days to appear. It seems the first stage is immense weight gain, the second stage is weakening of the bowels and gassiness, and I think stage three is finally going into effect. Stage three seems to affect the brain of the host and drive them into a primal state temporarily where their only thoughts are to eat whatever is around them......including living creatures. Not only that but you're not the only one with these symptoms. I've attached a video of a recording taken from one of the surveillance cameras around my hideout. It's not pretty." Bentley reported.

Sly couldn't believe what he was hearing. People with the disease are going to start each other eventually and he would be one of them. He was actually starting to want to find a cure for this, although in the back of his mind it did sound intriguing. "I know it may be gruesome but you need to watch it. I think it shows that the longer people are in stage three, the more they'll want to eat people by choice. I wish I could say things will get better from here but I'd be lying. If my calculations are right, everyone who's infected will enter stage three in between two weeks times, two months if we're lucky. I suggest you modify some of your robotic assistants with weaponry and add some defense mechanisms around your lab. Some of the infected may see you as a juicy meal. I also recommend you keep up your research and notify me of any new changes; this infections could still be evolving and who knows what could come next. I'm sorry I can't be there with you to help you through this. Hopefully we find a way to beat this soon before it's too late. Bentley out."

The video ended and Penelope's ears were starting to look glassy. She put a hand to the screen as she tried not to show tears. "Are you out of your mind Cooper!?" Carmelita shouted as she pulled her arm back. "You heard what she said, she could eat us."

"Everyone is going to be eating everyone. If we take her she could eat anyone that comes after us. Besides, she can make us some of those assistants of hers to retrieve food for us. Besides, look at her. She's miserable here."

Carmelita looked at Penelope and had to admit she looked pitiful. However she was a threat and could fend for herself. Carmelita's job was to find Bentley, not take care of Sly's fat teammates. In the end, Carmelita had made her decision.

Inspector Carmelita Fox did her best to keep her mind on her work as she finished typing her report. It was nearing 5PM and while she was normally not a clock watcher by habit, she had a very good reason to be anxious today. She had a date tonight, a date with one of Paris' greatest and most elusive criminals, Sly Cooper.

Even though Sly was a wanted criminal, he and Carmelita had an arrangement, he would continue to steal from criminals and she would arrest said criminals in an attempt to catch him. They got together and compared notes from time to time when both was sure they could do so without anyone getting wise, but tonight, they had agreed to have a little fun together, just the two of them.

Carmelita switched her computer off, clocked out and headed for her car. Moments later, she was pulling in behind a derelict warehouse in the waterfront district. After she parked, Carmelita looked and listened carefully. Nothing but the sound of water lapping the slimy pillars. Carmelita smiled to herself and made her way to a side door, used a police pass key to get inside and slipped out of one darkness and into another.

As she closed the door behind her, Carmelita took stock of her surroundings. The roof of the warehouse had several large windows in it, allowing plenty of moonlight in to illuminate what little furniture there was inside. There was a table covered with a rather cliché checkered tablecloth, two chairs, and a musicians stand and several boxes off to the side.

To the casual onlooker, all of these things would seem very out of place, but Carmelita knew that something like this would be here. Not to long after they had started seeing each other, Carmelita and Sly had discovered something they had in common, they each had a thing for vore. info.brief_description: A combined story of the popular video game characters
info.description:
Combined inflation, weight gain, whatever you wish story for Jak and Daxter, Ratchet and Clank and even Sly Cooper! You may focus on one character at a time (for instance, focus only on Daxter putting on weight), or keep 'em together.

Sexual content is allowed (of any form), as is slob content, don't feel restricted. You may also include other themes such as macro, vore, etc. Feel free to combine as you see fit!
